message.content: in the google cloud project ID emailpilot-438321 wht is the difference between the emailpilot-api and the email pilot-app?

content.text: I'll help you understand the difference between these two services in your Google Cloud project. Let me examine both to identify their distinct purposes.

          value: emailpilot-438321
        image: gcr.io/emailpilot-438321/emailpilot-api:latest
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http1

content.text:
Based on the Cloud Run service details, here are the key differences:

**emailpilot-api**:
- Backend API service (FastAPI/Python)
- Uses custom image: `gcr.io/emailpilot-438321/emailpilot-api:latest` 
- Has production environment variables configured
- Serves REST API endpoints at port 8080
- URL: https://emailpilot-api-p3cxgvcsla-uc.a.run.app

**emailpilot-app**:
- Frontend application service
- Uses Cloud Build deployed image from Artifact Registry
- Likely serves the React/web interface
- Also runs on port 8080
- URL: https://emailpilot-app-p3cxgvcsla-uc.a.run.app

The `-api` service handles backend logic and Klaviyo integrations, while `-app` serves the user-facing web interface.
